name: Sam Boodram
description: '''Samdeo''' "'''Sam'''" '''Boodram''' (14 July 1933 â€“ 30 June 2020) was a [[Trinidad and Tobago|Trinidadian]] [[Chutney music|Chutney]], [[Bhajan]], [[Indian classical music|Indian classical]] and [[Indian folk music|folk]] singer, [[Kabir Panth|Kabir Panthi]] [[mahant]], and cocoa farmer. He recorded over 6,000 songs over the span of his career.
